name: Suddenly Captains
description:
A school project from 2019

A fun little game about 2 janitors that have to land a ship safely, it is by no means perfect and sometimes the ship explodes on landing :)

2 player only, 2 controllers required

Controls:

move around with joystick

activate consoles with A/X

there are 5 consoles:
top middle activates landing gear(you need this to land)
middle left/right activate left and right thruster,
middle middle console use thrust,
bottom console activates main thruster.
